languages.text: {n}В тени самых высоких деревьев Вольный Торговец замечает крупные, почти по пояс взрослому мужчине, грибы. Из-под бледно-лиловых шляпок почти до самой земли свисают пряди губчатой ткани. Но стоит приблизиться, отростки тут же втягиваются, шляпка сворачивается вверх, и гриб выплевывает облако красноватых спор. Вероятно, этот участок лучше обойти стороной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В тени самых высоких деревьев Вольный Торговец замечает крупные, почти по пояс взрослому мужчине, грибы. Из-под бледно-лиловых шляпок почти до самой земли свисают пряди губчатой ткани. Но стоит приблизиться, отростки тут же втягиваются, шляпка сворачивается вверх, и гриб выплевывает облако красноватых спор. Вероятно, этот участок лучше обойти стороной.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In the shade of the tallest trees in this area of the forest, the Rogue Trader spots mushrooms that come up as high as {mf|his|her} waist. Strands of sponge-like tissue hang from under their pale lilac caps, almost reaching the ground. As soon as the Rogue Trader approaches one of the mushrooms, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up, and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. Perhaps it would be wiser to give this place a wide berth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В тени самых высоких деревьев Вольный Торговец замечает крупные, почти по пояс взрослому мужчине, грибы. Из-под бледно-лиловых шляпок почти до самой земли свисают пряди губчатой ткани. Но стоит приблизиться, отростки тут же втягиваются, шляпка сворачивается вверх, и гриб выплевывает облако красноватых спор. Вероятно, этот участок лучше обойти стороной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Rogue Trader spots tall mushrooms — coming up to a grown man's waist — in the shade of the tallest trees. From under their pale lilac caps, strands of sponge-like tissue are growing, almost reaching the ground. When approached, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. It would be wise to stay away from this place.{/n}

From under their pale lilac caps, strands of sponge-like tissue are growing, almost reaching the ground. When approached, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. It would be wise to stay away from this place.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente encuentra unos hongos que le llegan a la cintura a la sombra de los árboles más altos. De la parte inferior de sus pálidos sombreros morados cuelgan hebras de un tejido esponjoso que llegan casi hasta el suelo. Al acercar la mano, las hebras se retraen, el sombrero se contrae y el hongo libera una nube de esporas rojizas. Sería conveniente mantenerse alejado de este lugar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the shade of the tallest trees in this area of the forest, the Rogue Trader spots mushrooms that come up as high as {mf|his|her} waist. Strands of sponge-like tissue hang from under their pale lilac caps, almost reaching the ground. As soon as the Rogue Trader approaches one of the mushrooms, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up, and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. Perhaps it would be wiser to give this place a wide berth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente encuentra unos hongos de tamaño considerable (casi hasta la cintura de un hombre adulto) a la sombra de los árboles más altos. De la parte inferior de sus pálidos sombreros morados cuelgan hebras de un tejido esponjoso que llegan casi hasta el suelo. Al acercar la mano, las hebras se retraen, el sombrero se contrae y el hongo libera una nube de esporas rojizas. Sería conveniente mantenerse alejado de este lugar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在森林里最高的树荫下，行商浪人发现了某种巨型蘑菇。这种蘑菇长到了行商浪人腰部那么高，淡紫色的菌盖下垂着一缕缕海绵状组织，几乎垂到地面。当行商浪人靠近蘑菇时，蘑菇的菌丝立刻收起，菌盖随之上卷，喷出一团红色的孢子。为保险起见，或许最好离这个地方远点。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the shade of the tallest trees in this area of the forest, the Rogue Trader spots mushrooms that come up as high as {mf|his|her} waist. Strands of sponge-like tissue hang from under their pale lilac caps, almost reaching the ground. As soon as the Rogue Trader approaches one of the mushrooms, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up, and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. Perhaps it would be wiser to give this place a wide berth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在森林里最高的树荫下，行商浪人发现了某种巨型蘑菇。这种蘑菇能长到成年人腰部那么高，淡紫色的菌盖下垂着缕缕海绵状的组织，不断生长，几乎垂到地面。当有人靠近蘑菇时，这些丝线就会收起，菌盖随之上卷，喷出一团红色的孢子。为保险起见，最好远离这个地方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'ombre des plus grands arbres de ce secteur, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} aperçoit de gros champignons qui lui arrivent à la taille. Sous leurs chapeaux couleur lilas pendent des lanières spongieuses qui touchent presque le sol. Lorsque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'en approche, les lanières se rétractent, le chapeau se relève et le champignon crache un nuage de spores rougeâtres. Il serait avisé de rester à bonne distance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the shade of the tallest trees in this area of the forest, the Rogue Trader spots mushrooms that come up as high as {mf|his|her} waist. Strands of sponge-like tissue hang from under their pale lilac caps, almost reaching the ground. As soon as the Rogue Trader approaches one of the mushrooms, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up, and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. Perhaps it would be wiser to give this place a wide berth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'ombre des plus grands arbres de ce secteur, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} aperçoit de gros champignons qui lui arrivent à la taille. Sous leurs chapeaux couleur lilas pendent des lanières spongieuses qui touchent presque le sol. Lorsque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'en approche, les lanières se rétractent, le chapeau se relève et le champignon crache un nuage de spores rougeâtres. Il serait avisé de rester à bonne distance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この森の中でも最も高い木々の木陰で、自由開拓者は、腰ほどまである背の高いキノコを見つけた。淡い薄紫色の傘の下から、スポンジのような組織が地面に届きそうなほど伸びている。近づくと、その繊維が引き寄せられ、傘が巻き上がり、キノコが赤っぽい胞子の雲を吐き出す。この場所には近づかない方が賢明だろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the shade of the tallest trees in this area of the forest, the Rogue Trader spots mushrooms that come up as high as {mf|his|her} waist. Strands of sponge-like tissue hang from under their pale lilac caps, almost reaching the ground. As soon as the Rogue Trader approaches one of the mushrooms, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up, and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. Perhaps it would be wiser to give this place a wide berth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この森の中でも最も高い木々の木陰で、自由開拓者は、腰ほどまである背の高いキノコを見つけた。淡い薄紫色の傘の下から、スポンジのような組織が地面に届きそうなほど伸びている。近づくと、その繊維が引き寄せられ、傘が巻き上がり、キノコが赤っぽい胞子の雲を吐き出す。この場所には近づかない方が賢明だろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Im Schatten der größten Bäume in diesem Teil des Waldes entdeckt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Pilze, die {mf|ihm|ihr} bis an die Hüfte reichen. Das schwammartige Geflecht unter den blassen violetten Kappen reicht fast bis zum Boden. Als sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Pilzen nähert, zieht sich das Geflecht zurück, die Kappe rollt sich ein und der Pilz stößt eine Wolke rötlicher Sporen aus. Es wäre wohl besser, einen großen Bogen um diesen Ort zu machen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the shade of the tallest trees in this area of the forest, the Rogue Trader spots mushrooms that come up as high as {mf|his|her} waist. Strands of sponge-like tissue hang from under their pale lilac caps, almost reaching the ground. As soon as the Rogue Trader approaches one of the mushrooms, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up, and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. Perhaps it would be wiser to give this place a wide berth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} erblickt im Schatten der höchsten Bäume große Pilze, so hoch wie die Hüfte eines erwachsenen Mannes. Unter den blassvioletten Kappen wachsen schwammartige Gewerbesträhnen, die fast bis zum Boden reichen. Wenn man sich den Pilzen nähert, ziehen die Strähnen sich hinauf, die Kappe rollt sich ein und der Pilz versprüht eine Wolke rötlicher Sporen. Man sollte wohl lieber Abstand halten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir, ormanın bu bölgesindeki en uzun ağaçların gölgesi altında bileğine kadar gelen mantarlar olduğunu fark ediyor. Eflatun rengi solgun başlarının altından süngerimsi bir dokuya sahip lifler sarkarak neredeyse yere değiyor. Hür Tacir'in mantarlardan birine yaklaşmasıyla birlikte lifler çekiliyor ve mantar, kızılımsı sporlarla dolu bir bulut püskürtüyor. Belki de bu bölgeden kaçınmak daha akıllıca olacaktır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the shade of the tallest trees in this area of the forest, the Rogue Trader spots mushrooms that come up as high as {mf|his|her} waist. Strands of sponge-like tissue hang from under their pale lilac caps, almost reaching the ground. As soon as the Rogue Trader approaches one of the mushrooms, the strands draw in, the cap rolls up, and the mushroom spews out a cloud of reddish spores. Perhaps it would be wiser to give this place a wide berth.{/n}
